title.narrative: Degree of Institutional Engagement in Food Security through Research, Extension and Monitoring

description.narrative: Degree of Institutional Engagement in Food Security through Research, Extension and Monitoring

title.narrative: Degree of Institutional Engagement in Food Security through Research, Extension and Monitoring

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Existing Structures are weak with capacity gaps

comment.narrative: Existing Structures are weak with capacity gaps

target.value: Increased structural institutional engagement through strengthened support systems

comment.narrative: Increased structural institutional engagement through strengthened support systems

actual.value: Institutional engagement greatly improved shown by policy actions of Statre Governments following capacity development efforts of the programme
